data1.Desc: An invalid SSL certificate is issued when installing the Docker Swarm application with the Portainer option enabled
The file-sync add-on does not work with the LLSMP stack
WildFly Cluster nodes are not displayed in the admin panel of the controller node
An error occurs when installing OpenSearch for the Magento or Magento Cluster application
An error occurs when installing the Magento or Magento Cluster application from the Marketplace
An error occurs when installing the IOTA application from the Marketplace
The Eclipse Vert.x Thin Jar Builder application does not work after installation from the Marketplace
The Rocket.Chat application does not work after restarting the environment
The PrestaShop application does not work with the platform’s Built-In SSL feature
An error occurs when installing the Eclipse Che package from the Marketplace
An error occurs when installing the Let’s Encrypt add-on with a domain that has a redirect
Cron tasks on all nodes of the layer should be cleaned up upon the Let’s Encrypt add-on removal
Let’s Encrypt certificate update operation cannot be performed by the collaboration member
An error occurs when installing the Drupal application from the Marketplace
The Open Liberty application does not work in the Kubernetes Cluster
The Galera Cluster application does not work after restarting the environment
An error occurs when installing the Jira package from the Marketplace

data2.Desc: An error occurs when backing up the containers during the dashboard operation
Incorrect permissions for some authentication configuration files in containers
Directory mounts are missing after container redeployment to the alpine-based image
Slow response of the GetEnvs API method for environments with many external domains
Incorrect escaping for special characters in the environment variables
Password authentication should be disabled when connecting over SSH
The autofs service start is delayed after the container restart
An error occurs when creating nodes based on the httpd:2.4-alpine image
An error occurs if the manually created firewall set has the same name as any of the system ones
Insufficient permissions to attach/detach add-ons are provided via the Containers > Add-Ons collaboration policy
The platform CLI is not supported on the Java 8 engine
Mandatory appid parameters are marked as optional in the API documentation
Unhandled error for the getTemplates API when an unknown type is specified in parameters
The NullPointerException error occurs when executing some API methods
The GetStat and GetSumStat API methods return excessive data
Incorrect escaping in the names of the collaboration environment groups
The list of collaboration members is not sorted
Incorrect dashboard fonts when working on the Linux OS
